title: How to Make Cupcakes with Self‐Raising Flour

steps.headline: Put the butter into a bowl and beat until light and fluffy.
Add the sugar and beat it in.
Add 1 egg and whisk it into the butter and sugar.
Add the other egg and whisk it in.
Add the flour and fold it into the mixture using a spatula or wooden spoon.
Add the milk and vanilla essence.
Put the batter into 12 cupcake cases.
steps.description: Make sure that they are evenly distributed.

steps.headline: Place the tray in the oven and bake for around 12 to 15 minutes.
Eat the cupcakes as they are or decorate them.

text: Measure out all the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F). Put the butter into a bowl and beat until light and fluffy.  Add the sugar and beat it in.  Add 1 egg and whisk it into the butter and sugar.  Add the other egg and whisk it in.  Add the flour and fold it into the mixture using a spatula or wooden spoon.  Add the milk and vanilla essence.  Put the batter into 12 cupcake cases. Make sure that they are evenly distributed. Place the tray in the oven and bake for around 12 to 15 minutes.  Allow the cupcakes to cool.  Eat the cupcakes as they are or decorate them.
sentences: Put the butter into a bowl and beat until light and fluffy.
Add the sugar and beat it in.
Add 1 egg and whisk it into the butter and sugar.
Add the other egg and whisk it in.
Add the flour and fold it into the mixture using a spatula or wooden spoon.
Add the milk and vanilla essence.
Put the batter into 12 cupcake cases.
Make sure that they are evenly distributed.
Place the tray in the oven and bake for around 12 to 15 minutes.
Eat the cupcakes as they are or decorate them.
